alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 3:36PM AKST until December 21 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Klawock, higher elevations on Prince of Wales road system, communities on eastern Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is anticipated to change to rain along the coast Tuesday morning. There is still some uncertainty in how far east the rain snow line will advance across Prince of Wales Island and could result in lower snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
